revisions.rev:
'''Ethan''' (or '''Eitan''', '''Eytan''' or '''Etan''' in Hebrew) is a male given name meaning strong, firm, and safe. {{TOCright}} ==People== For all people with the given name Ethan see [[Ethan (given name)]]
==Places== *[[Eitan, Israel]] *[[Ethan, South Dakota]] *[[Fort Ethan Allen (Arlington, Virginia)]] *[[Neve Eitan]], Israel
==Fiction== *[[Ethan of Athos]], 1986 novel by Lois McMaster Bujold *[[Ethan Brand]], 1850 short story by Nathaniel Hawthorne *[[Ethan Frome]], 1911 novel by Edith Wharton *[[Ethan Rom]], a character from the television series [[LOST]] *[[Ethan Hunt]], the lead character in the film series [[Mission: Impossible]] *Ethan Kairos, the main character in the game [[Time Hollow]] *[[Ethan Mars]], the lead character in the game [[Heavy Rain]]
==Other uses== *[[Ethan Allen boating accident]] *[[Ethan Allen class submarine]], American class of ballistic missile submarines **[[USS Ethan Allen (SSBN-608)]], American submarine *[[Ethan Allen Express]], passenger train operated by Amtrak between New York City and Rutland, Vermont *[[Ethan Allen (furniture company)]], American furniture chain *[[IAI Eitan]], Israeli reconnaissance unmanned air vehicle *[[USS Ethan Allen (1859)]], American Civil War warship
==See also== *[[Eitan (disambiguation)]] *[[Etan (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}}
